verses.verse: <S%G1437>If<s%> I <S%G2980>speak<s%> with the <S%G1100>tongues<s%> of <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G32>angels<s%>, <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G26>love<s%>, I have <S%G1096>become<s%> as <S%G2278>sounding<s%> <S%G5475>brass<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> a <S%G214>tinkling<s%> <S%G2950>cymbal<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G1437>though<s%> I <S%G2192>have<s%> the gift of <S%G4394>prophecy<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1492>understand<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3466>mysteries<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1108>knowledge<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1437>though<s%> I <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%>, so <S%G5620>that<s%> I could <S%G3179>remove<s%> <S%G3735>mountains<s%>, <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G26>love<s%>, I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G1437>though<s%> I <S%G5595>give<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G5224>goods<s%> to <S%G5595>feed<s%> the <S%G2532>poor<s%>, and <S%G1437>though<s%> I <S%G3860>give<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4983>body<s%> <S%G2443>to<s%> be <S%G2545>burned<s%>, <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G26>love<s%>, it profits <S%G5623>me<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%>.

<S%G26>Love<s%> <S%G3763>never<s%> <S%G1601>fails<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G1535>where<s%> there are <S%G4394>prophecies<s%>, they shall <S%G2673>fail<s%>; <S%G1535>where<s%> there are <S%G1100>tongues<s%>, they shall <S%G3973>cease<s%>; <S%G1535>where<s%> there is <S%G1108>knowledge<s%>, it shall vanish <S%G2673>away<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> that which <S%G3588>is<s%> <S%G5046>perfect<s%> is <S%G2064>come<s%>, <S%G5119>then<s%> that which <S%G3588>is<s%> <S%G1537>in<s%> <S%G3313>part<s%> shall be done away <S%G2673>with<s%>.

<S%G3753>When<s%> I <S%G2252>was<s%> a <S%G3516>child<s%>, I <S%G2980>spoke<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> a <S%G3516>child<s%>, I <S%G5426>understood<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> a <S%G3516>child<s%>, I <S%G3049>thought<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> a <S%G3516>child<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> I <S%G1096>became<s%> a <S%G435>man<s%>, I put <S%G2673>away<s%> <S%G3516>childish<s%> <S%G3588>things<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G737>now<s%> we <S%G991>see<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> a <S%G1722>mirror<s%>, <S%G135>darkly<s%>; <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G5119>then<s%> <S%G4383>face<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G4383>face<s%>: <S%G737>now<s%> I <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G1537>in<s%> <S%G3313>part<s%>; <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G5119>then<s%> shall I <S%G1921>know<s%> even <S%G2531>as<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> I am <S%G1921>known<s%>.
